main event: An elliptical-shaped object the size of a football with pulsating lights was sighted north of Midway Island.
interesting points: The object had a slight orange color and a tail-like structure.
The object was initially sighted at 15 degrees above the horizon and moved 10-15 degrees off for 10-15 seconds.
The object appeared 1 to 3 degrees larger than an average meteor and was sighted for 30 to 35 seconds before disappearing on the horizon.
The object's speed was slower than an average meteor.
The object was sighted visually by both a pilot and an engineer, with the weather being clear with light clouds on the horizon and unlimited visibility.
sighted object: an elliptical-shaped object with pulsating lights
